select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, c.car_no, u.phone, c.car_date from users u, departments d, user_info ui, car c where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = c.id
and name LIKE '%${name}%'
and carNo LIKE '%${carNo}%'
and deptName LIKE '%${deptName}%'

select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, c.car_no, u.phone, c.car_date, ui.rank, u.emp_grade from users u, departments d, user_info ui, car c where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = c.id and u.id = #{id}
